website_summaries.verdict: Provides a DEET-free romantic glow and allows you to fight mosquitoes over a wide area.
pros: Attractive Mason jars are a great gift for others or yourself
A good choice to add ambiance to an outdoor party and keep bugs away

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work even for a second. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could leave zero stars. Literally does not work at all. I keep getting bit on my ankles while I sit outside at my table. I even moved the candle down to the ground to sit right between my feet and still got bitten. Even lit all three - still got bit. Not even I can smell the citronella. These are just ugly, useless candles. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: FAR FROM BEING CITRONELLA!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews before purchasing these. They smell NOTHING LIKE CITRONELLA!!! They smell like bananas. I think they are old. I tried to contact seller but there isn't an option to do so. I am goin to return these and stick to the name brand in the metal ..
customer_reviews.author: TOBYZ MOM

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These r the worst candles I have ever bought they will not stay lit. Don’t waste money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Billy M.

customer_reviews.title: They worked great! Although
customer_reviews.text: They worked great! Although, within a couple days, one of the wicks burnt out or broke off, I'm not sure. Still is almost full of "wax" but is now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Needs more factory quality control ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles, but my most recent order had the wicks terribly off-center. Seems the factory needs more quality control overseeing. A wick that isn't (reasonably) centered won't let the candle burn evenly, and it's kind of a waste. I have returned the last shipment. Sad, because for the money, it's a great product. Might have to make a switch next summer, to control mosquitos~ which these candles do beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Schreiber, M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Sorry to said, not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The wick can't sustain fire long enough.. Once in the middle of bottle, fire just died. I still have another bottle that not even lid.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Marren

customer_reviews.title: These seem to work well
customer_reviews.text: They have a tiny bit of a strange smell, (not citronella) but overall it is ok. These seem to work well for misquitos, which is what I was looking for. They are really cute and it is nice to have the screw top to put on after use and to keep the rain out if you leave them outside
customer_reviews.author: LadyGreene

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful I lit one and mosquitoes did not bother me ..I like that it's deet free. It has a wonderful aroma...love that it's in a jar..this would make a perfect gift.Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Blackbear

customer_reviews.title: Great repellant
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and work well, especially indoors. They come packaged beautifully and arrive in tact. Special bonus is that you can re-use the jar and lid (not for canning) but for other things. If you like mason jar type things, these are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra Mcclung

customer_reviews.title: Not the best in all categories
customer_reviews.text: Not great these candles were used in an area where mosquitoes were quite prevalent and really didn’t do what was advertised in regards to getting rid of The mosquitoes
customer_reviews.author: edward charles lucas

customer_reviews.title: Unscented
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! It’s just a regular yellow candle with no citronella scent, no lemon grass, no scent at all so of course it does not repell bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Deage

customer_reviews.title: These candles keep the bugs away. However, the ...
customer_reviews.text: These candles keep the bugs away. However, the structure of the jar causes the wax to pool and the flame to extinguish.
customer_reviews.author: kgf

customer_reviews.title: Control the seasonal
customer_reviews.text: Love these. We just finished building a deck and these work nicely sitting around controlling the seasonal bugs!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy W.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible candle - cannot smell the citronella at all. Lit up all three and still get eaten by mosquitos. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nina M.

customer_reviews.title: Wicks aren’t big enough or something.
customer_reviews.text: The wicks on these got lost in the wax after one use. On two out of three of the candles. Haven’t used the third one yet. They were very inexpensive considering shipping costs. So I guess I’ll just try to melt the leftover wax and make my own candle. Because it’s too late to return them now.
customer_reviews.author: Kala Martin

customer_reviews.title: Smell great
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well.. kept the bugs away and also smelled really good. I would buy these again and recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay lit
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if its due to the design or poorly made, but the candle does not stay lit. I purchased a set of 3 and experienced the same issue with all 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with these candles.
customer_reviews.text: I was very unhappy with this product. The wicks are very thin and break right off, causing it to be difficult to light. It will stay lit for maybe 10 minutes but the melted wax clogs up the space where the wick is. We tried to move some of it around to help but no luck. The wicks keep breaking. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Flores

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay lit
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect about these until I had to continue to battle to keep them lit.
customer_reviews.author: "martha002"

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work!
customer_reviews.text: I like mason jars however, they do not smell like citronella and do not keep mosquitoes away. I used one for first time this evening. I got tons of bites on my legs. I put candle in the ground but that did not help. Do not waste your money on these candles.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good, but didn't keep many bugs away. Smells nice though.
customer_reviews.author: ARL1128

customer_reviews.title: ... a fix all to skeeters but helps and smells better than citronella
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a fix all to skeeters but helps and smells better than citronella
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help
customer_reviews.text: The candles didn’t seem to work. It wasn’t an overpowering smell but it was t enough to fight away the skeeters :(
customer_reviews.author: Maredith Feldshau

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! They are cute & keep the bugs away!
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to work, mosquitoes are still around but they dont bite.. (?)
customer_reviews.author: dave a

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not an overly powerful scent, just enough. I can only assume it is working.
customer_reviews.author: P. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Very very very good candles!
customer_reviews.text: Very very very good candles !! Smells nice and actually keeps mosquitos away. Very cute also to put anywhere outdoors. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Cheka Handal

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Work great. Took them camping and added light and big protection.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great long burning candles, I will be buying more come summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: These candles work well out on our patio to help keep the mosquitoes away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flame keeps getting extinguished as the wick falls into the melted wax
customer_reviews.author: Jamshed E.

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and seems to keep the mosquitoes away from what I can tell. Even if they don’t they looked great in my patio at night.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Horn

product_meta.title: Lumabase 26603 3 Count Citronella Scented Candles in Mason Jar, 12 oz, Yellow
product_meta.description: These 3 glass Mason jars are filled with 12oz of the finest paraffin citronella scented fragrance. The DEET free formula is used as a Mosquito repellent. Each Candle will burn for 76 hours. For outdoor use only.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars197 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
